question: Write an SQL query to select all records from a table named 'students'.
sampleOutput: Displays all rows from students table.

question: Write an SQL query to insert a new student with name 'Ravi' and age 20 into the students table.
Write an SQL query to update the age of a student named 'Ravi' to 21.
answer: UPDATE students SET age = 21 WHERE name = 'Ravi';

question: Write an SQL query to delete a student whose name is 'Ravi'.
Write an SQL query to select all students whose age is greater than 18.
sampleOutput: Shows students with age greater than 18.

question:
Employee Salary Analysis

You have been given a database with an employees table. Your task is to retrieve the names and salaries of all employees who earn more than 50,000.


Schema:

  • id (Integer): Unique ID of the employee
  • name (Text): Name of the employee
  • department (Text): Department the employee belongs to
  • salary (Integer): Annual salary of the employee
answer: SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
sampleInput:
Table: employees
Columns: id, name, department, salary
